SELECT TEST.*, COUNT(state) as ea FROM ( SELECT trunc(b.create_date, 'dd') create_date, p.pfm_idx, p.name, p.pfm_start, p.pfm_end, b.book_group, trunc(b.cancel_date, 'dd') cancel_date, bc.state, pi.stored_name, h.hall_name, pd.pfm_date, pd.pfm_time FROM book b JOIN performance p ON b.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx JOIN pfm_datebytime pd ON b.pfm_dbt_idx = pd.pfm_dbt_idx JOIN book_cate bc ON b.book_cate_idx = bc.book_cate_idx WHERE b.user_idx = #{userIdx} ) TEST GROUP BY create_date, name, pfm_start, pfm_end, book_group, cancel_date, state, stored_name, hall_name, pfm_date, pfm_time,pfm_idx ORDER BY create_date
